item.description:
Our group (North of Boston Boomers) is having brunch at the Common Man on Sunday, November 1st and I thought your group might like to join us. They have a great brunch, Ann Marie and I tried it last Sunday (yum!). We thought we would make it around 11 so that it really is a "brunch". Hope to see some of you there!
directions to the Common Man: Route 93 to exit 3, take a right off the exit, go to the end and turn right at the lights (route 111A)... Common Man is about 1 mile down on 111A. Just ask for Ann Marie's group.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Brunch at the Common Man
